message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $18,000. I believe it holds significant value and will be a worthwhile investment for you.
I'm interested in the product, but $18,000 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $12,000 for it.
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $18,000 represents the product's true value, I'm willing to come down to $15,000. This is my final offer.
I'm still interested in the product, but $15,000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $13,500 for it.
